title-group.article-title: CNKI中脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献的计量分析 Quantitative Analysis of High Citations of CNKI Midbrain Infarction Combined with Cerebral Hemorrhage

aff.addr-line: 延安大学附属医院神经内科，陕西 延安

permissions.copyright-statement: © Copyright 2014 by authors and Scientific Research Publishing Inc.

license.license-p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution International License (CC BY). http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

abstract.p: 目的：分析脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献的计量特征，为脑梗死并脑出血的学科发展提供参考，为今后该杂志选题、组稿等工作提供参考。方法：检索中国学术期刊全文数据库(CNKI)1964至2019年的脑梗死并脑出血文献，参照普赖斯定律确定高被引文献，用Excel 2007统计分析被引、年份、期刊、作者、单位、关键词、基金。结果：检出高被引文献202篇，计被引5453次，篇均被引27.06次；文献数自1994年开始上升至2005年呈曲线上升；文献分布在112种期刊，《中华老年心脑血管病杂志》、《卒中与神经病学杂志》、《中风与神经疾病杂志》、《脑与神经疾病杂志》、《中国实用神经病杂志》、《中国实用神经疾病杂志》的文献数居前5位；文献作者共746人、署名792次，总合作率87.13%，作者张薇薇、吕传真的署名数依次居前2位；作者机构202个，其中医院占52.48%，30个核心发文机构中院校占93.3%，署有复旦大学、上海交通大学、北京军区总医院、河北医科大学、中南大学、华中科技大学、安徽医科大学、天津医科大学、首都医科大学的文献数居前5位；涉及关键词365个、887次，关键词“脑出血”、“脑梗死”、“脑卒中”、“危险因素”、“同型半胱氨酸”、“脑病”、“脑血管意外”、“预后”、“蛛网膜下腔出血”、“脑血管病”的使用频次居前10位。46篇文献获基金56项次。结论：CNKI数据库脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献呈现以《中华老年心脑血管病杂志》、《卒中与神经病学杂志》、《中风与神经疾病杂志》、《脑与神经疾病杂志》、《中国实用神经病杂志》、《中国实用神经疾病杂志》为权威期刊，以院校为核心发文机构，以脑梗死并脑出血为主要研究对象，以省部级以上项目为主要资助基金的特征，形成了张薇薇、吕传真等为代表的核心团队，但关键词使用不够规范、资助资金偏少。 Objective: To analyze the quantitative characteristics of highly cited literatures on cerebral infarction complicated with cerebral hemorrhage. Methods: The literatures of cerebral infarction complicated with cerebral hemorrhage from 1964 to 2019 were retrieved from China Academic Journal Full-text Database (CNKI). The literatures with high citation frequency were determined according to Price’s law. The citation, year, journal, author, unit, key words and fund were statistically analyzed by Excel2007. Results: 202 highly cited references were detected, with 5453 cited times (27.06 cited times per paper). The number of literatures increased from 1994 to 2005 and showed a curve increase. The literatures were distributed in 112 journals, and the number of literatures of Chinese Journal of Geriatric Cardio-Cerebral and Vascular Diseases, Journal of Medical and Neurological Diseases, Journal of Stroke and Neurological Diseases, Journal of Brain and Neurological Diseases, Chinese Journal of Practical Neurology and Chinese Journal of Practical Neurological Diseases ranked the top 5. There were 746 authors with 792 signatures, and the total cooperation rate was 87.13%. The authors Zhang Weiwei and Lv fax took the first two places in terms of their signatures. Among the 30 core publishing institutions, hospitals accounted for 52.48%, and colleges and universities accounted for 93.3%. Fudan University, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, General Hospital of Beijing Military Area Command, Hebei Medical University, Central South University, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Anhui Medical University, Tianjin Medical University and Capital Medical University ranked in the top five in terms of the number of literatures. There were 365 keywords and 887 times involved, and the use frequency of the keywords “cerebral hemorrhage”, “cerebral infarction”, “stroke”, “risk factors”, “homocysteine”, “encephalopathy”, “cerebrovascular accident”, “prognosis”, “subarachnoid hemorrhage” and “cerebrovascular disease” ranked in the top 10. 46 papers were funded for 56 times. Conclusion: Cerebral infarction and cerebral hemorrhage CNKI database highly cited documents appear in the journal of the Chinese elderly cardio-cerebrovascular disease, stroke and the journal of neurology, “journal of stroke and neurological diseases,” journal of brain and nerve disease, journal of Chinese practical mental derangement, journal of Chinese practical neurological diseases as the leading journal, colleges and universities as the core and dispatch agencies, to cerebral infarction with cerebral hemorrhage as the main research object and projects above the provincial and ministerial level as the main funding fund, the core team represented by Zhang Weiwei and Lv Fanfa has been formed, but the use of keywords is not standardized enough and the funding funds are too small.

kwd-group.kwd: 脑梗死，脑出血，CNKI，高被引，文献计量分析, Cerebral Infarction

sec.title: 摘要
sec.p: 目的：分析脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献的计量特征，为脑梗死并脑出血的学科发展提供参考，为今后该杂志选题、组稿等工作提供参考。方法：检索中国学术期刊全文数据库(CNKI)1964至2019年的脑梗死并脑出血文献，参照普赖斯定律确定高被引文献，用Excel 2007统计分析被引、年份、期刊、作者、单位、关键词、基金。结果：检出高被引文献202篇，计被引5453次，篇均被引27.06次；文献数自1994年开始上升至2005年呈曲线上升；文献分布在112种期刊，《中华老年心脑血管病杂志》、《卒中与神经病学杂志》、《中风与神经疾病杂志》、《脑与神经疾病杂志》、《中国实用神经病杂志》、《中国实用神经疾病杂志》的文献数居前5位；文献作者共746人、署名792次，总合作率87.13%，作者张薇薇、吕传真的署名数依次居前2位；作者机构202个，其中医院占52.48%，30个核心发文机构中院校占93.3%，署有复旦大学、上海交通大学、北京军区总医院、河北医科大学、中南大学、华中科技大学、安徽医科大学、天津医科大学、首都医科大学的文献数居前5位；涉及关键词365个、887次，关键词“脑出血”、“脑梗死”、“脑卒中”、“危险因素”、“同型半胱氨酸”、“脑病”、“脑血管意外”、“预后”、“蛛网膜下腔出血”、“脑血管病”的使用频次居前10位。46篇文献获基金56项次。结论：CNKI数据库脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献呈现以《中华老年心脑血管病杂志》、《卒中与神经病学杂志》、《中风与神经疾病杂志》、《脑与神经疾病杂志》、《中国实用神经病杂志》、《中国实用神经疾病杂志》为权威期刊，以院校为核心发文机构，以脑梗死并脑出血为主要研究对象，以省部级以上项目为主要资助基金的特征，形成了张薇薇、吕传真等为代表的核心团队，但关键词使用不够规范、资助资金偏少。

sec.title: 关键词
sec.p: 脑梗死，脑出血，CNKI，高被引，文献计量分析

sec.title: Quantitative Analysis of High Citations of CNKI Midbrain Infarction Combined with Cerebral Hemorrhage
sec.p: Juan Li, Tao Wang
Department of Neurology, Affiliated Hospital of Yan’an University, Yan’an Shaanxi
Received: Apr. 27th, 2021; accepted: May 11th, 2021; published: May 28th, 2021

sec.title: ABSTRACT
sec.p: Objective: To analyze the quantitative characteristics of highly cited literatures on cerebral infarction complicated with cerebral hemorrhage. Methods: The literatures of cerebral infarction complicated with cerebral hemorrhage from 1964 to 2019 were retrieved from China Academic Journal Full-text Database (CNKI). The literatures with high citation frequency were determined according to Price’s law. The citation, year, journal, author, unit, key words and fund were statistically analyzed by Excel2007. Results: 202 highly cited references were detected, with 5453 cited times (27.06 cited times per paper). The number of literatures increased from 1994 to 2005 and showed a curve increase. The literatures were distributed in 112 journals, and the number of literatures of Chinese Journal of Geriatric Cardio-Cerebral and Vascular Diseases, Journal of Medical and Neurological Diseases, Journal of Stroke and Neurological Diseases, Journal of Brain and Neurological Diseases, Chinese Journal of Practical Neurology and Chinese Journal of Practical Neurological Diseases ranked the top 5. There were 746 authors with 792 signatures, and the total cooperation rate was 87.13%. The authors Zhang Weiwei and Lv fax took the first two places in terms of their signatures. Among the 30 core publishing institutions, hospitals accounted for 52.48%, and colleges and universities accounted for 93.3%. Fudan University, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, General Hospital of Beijing Military Area Command, Hebei Medical University, Central South University, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Anhui Medical University, Tianjin Medical University and Capital Medical University ranked in the top five in terms of the number of literatures. There were 365 keywords and 887 times involved, and the use frequency of the keywords “cerebral hemorrhage”, “cerebral infarction”, “stroke”, “risk factors”, “homocysteine”, “encephalopathy”, “cerebrovascular accident”, “prognosis”, “subarachnoid hemorrhage” and “cerebrovascular disease” ranked in the top 10. 46 papers were funded for 56 times. Conclusion: Cerebral infarction and cerebral hemorrhage CNKI database highly cited documents appear in the journal of the Chinese elderly cardio-cerebrovascular disease, stroke and the journal of neurology, “journal of stroke and neurological diseases,” journal of brain and nerve disease, journal of Chinese practical mental derangement, journal of Chinese practical neurological diseases as the leading journal, colleges and universities as the core and dispatch agencies, to cerebral infarction with cerebral hemorrhage as the main research object and projects above the provincial and ministerial level as the main funding fund, the core team represented by Zhang Weiwei and Lv Fanfa has been formed, but the use of keywords is not standardized enough and the funding funds are too small.
Keywords:Cerebral Infarction, Cerebral Hemorrhage, China National Knowledge Infrastrucure (CNKI), Highly-Cited Papers, Bibliometrics

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

sec.title: 1. 引言
sec.p: 脑梗死(cerebral infarction, CI)是缺血性卒中(ischemic stroke)的总称，包括脑血栓形成、腔隙性梗死和脑栓塞等。脑出血是急性脑血管病中最严重的一种。国内文献多局限在脑梗死并脑出血病因病机、诊断等方面，尚无学者对文献本身的特征进行研究。本文对国内脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献进行了计量分析 [1] - [30]。以期为今后选题、组稿方向提供参考。

sec.title: 2.1. 文献获取
sec.p: 在2019年11月24日，高级检索了中国学术期刊全文数据库(CNKI)，关键词填写“脑梗死并脑出血”，选择精确匹配、发表时间在1964年7月1日到2019年10月24日的所有文献。

sec.title: 2.2. 高被引文献确定
sec.p: 用普赖斯定律确定方法。最高被引频次结果 η max 为275，N计算值等于12.42，故选取被引大于13的文献为高被引文献。

sec.title: 2.3. 文献的指标统计
sec.p: 重复或者多次投稿的文献。文献期刊的来源及发表时间、作者署名及所属单位、关键词和基金的名称、被引次数统计入Excel表，由2至3人校正后再进行统计分析。

sec.title: 3.2. 发表年份
sec.p: “脑梗死并脑出血”高被引文献最早为1996年、1996年~1998年基本无增长、1994~2005年呈曲线上升。2006年至峰值24篇曲线下降。见图1。
图1. CNKI中国脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献年度分布

sec.title: 3.3. 载文期刊
sec.p: 202篇脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献来自112种期刊，总载文比1.80。表1显示《中华老年心脑血管病杂志》、《卒中与神经病学杂志》、《中风与神经疾病杂志》、《脑与神经疾病杂志》、《中国实用神经病杂志》、《中国实用神经疾病杂志》的文献数居前5位。

caption.title: The journals with high citation number, total citation times and average citation times of CNKI cerebral infarction combined with cerebral hemorrhag

tr.td: 中华老年心脑血管病杂志
中国实用神经疾病杂志
中国神经免疫学和神经病学杂志
中国慢性病预防与控制

sec.p: 表1. CNKI脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献数量、总被引次、篇均被引次的期刊

sec.title: 3.4. 文献的作者统计
sec.p: 202篇“脑梗死并脑出血”高被引文献共出自746位作者。其中署名为5次、3次、2次、1次的分别为1人、1人、40人、704人。746位作者共署名792次。未明确作者人数3篇，占1.49%，独撰23篇，占11.39%；2人合作37篇，占18.32%；3人合作49篇，占19.31%。累计合作174篇，总合作率87.13%。见表2。

caption.title: Statistics of authors with high citation frequency of “cerebral infarction combined with cerebral hemorrhage” in CNK

tr.td: 边连防、曾军、陈生弟、迟兆富、董梅、傅毅、洪震、胡永善、黄茂盛、黄如训、金美华、李承晏、李义召、刘爱芬、刘芳龄、刘国荣、刘建伟、刘涛、刘新峰、刘言训、马驰骋、宁宪嘉、潘邓记、群森、孙琳、王景华、王涛、王伟、王小强、王振才、吴君仓、伍爱民、徐格林、杨期东、岳宏、张持、张东君、张国平、张苏明、周玢

sec.p: 表2. CNKI中“脑梗死并脑出血”高被引文献的作者统计

sec.title: 3.5. 作者机构
sec.p: x人合作的文献定义为1/x篇，附属医院的文献算入相应大学，共202篇“脑梗死并脑出血”的高被引文献出自202个机构。发文机构属于核心机构的文献数大于或等于1.99篇的共有30个。其中院校28个、医院2个，依次占93.33%，6.67%。见表3。

caption.title: Core authors of literatures with high citation frequency of CNKI cerebral infarction combined with cerebral hemorrhag

sec.p: 表3. CNKI脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献的核心发文机构

sec.title: 3.6. 关键词
sec.p: 200篇脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献列有关键词0~15个，共涉及关键词365个。其中，使用0个、2个、3个、4个、5个、6个、7个、8个、9个、10个、13个、15个关键词的文献，分别是1篇、7篇、63篇、64篇、33篇、16篇、6篇、3篇、3篇、3篇、1篇、2篇。见表4。

caption.title: Key words distribution of the cited references with high frequency of CNKI cerebral infarction combined with cerebral hemorrhag

tr.td: 神经元特异性烯醇化酶

sec.p: 表4. CNKI脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献关键词分布

sec.title: 3.7. 基金类别
sec.p: 在202篇脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献中国家自然科学基金3项次，占5.45%；国家九五攻关课题2项次。见表5。

caption.title: Funds distribution of highly cited CNKI cerebral infarction combined with cerebral hemorrhag

tr.td: 国家科委“十五”攻关基金
十一五国家科技支撑计划项目

sec.p: 表5. CNKI脑梗死并脑出血高被引文献基金分布

sec.title: 4. 讨论
sec.p: 文章对于载文期刊、文献作者的统计、作者机构、关键词、基金类型10年间的动态进展。本研究存在的问题：信息资料的提取。第一方面202篇文献共发表在112个学术期刊；第二方面由于未逐一查询112个期刊，可能使文献的纳入存在偏差；第三方面进一步分析核心期刊上的高被引文献更能反应高质量文献的关注热论文，本研究的核心期刊数量不足，相关研究未进一步对数据库的内文献进行筛选。

sec.title: 4.1. 文献来源的选择
sec.p: 由局限性，本研究纳入的文献为1996~2017年10年间。
此外，由于被引频次受发表时间的影响，在今后的研究中可扩大数据库的面、部分文献具有较高影响，但文献核心作者及数量最多。

sec.title: 4.2. 被引频次的确定
sec.p: 根据普赖斯定律，筛选了被引频次 ≥ 13的文献为高被引文献。通过被引次数筛选文献，限制了检索时间，导致研究结果不能全面的概括选择及文献发表时间，以更好的研究该领域的发展。综上所述，1996~2017年10年CNKI收录的脑梗死并脑出血的发展趋势。但研究者时间、人力不充足，本研究只探究了10年内CNKI收录的高被引文献，后续的研究可扩大数据库及年限以全面的研究，以进一步阐明该疾病的变化趋势。
